benchmark_details.name: RepoQA: Evaluating Long Context Code Understanding
benchmark_details.overview: RepoQA is a benchmark to evaluate LLMs on long-context code understanding through the Searching Needle Function (SNF) task, which includes 500 code search tasks across 50 popular repositories in 5 programming languages.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To quantitatively evaluate the long-context capabilities of LLMs when understanding code in real-world scenarios.

data.source: 500 code search tasks gathered from 50 popular code repositories.
data.annotation: Automatically annotated using GPT-4 for natural language descriptions.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy is calculated based on the retrieval success rate of LLMs retrieving correct functions.
methodology.interpretation: Models are compared based on their accuracy in retrieving relevant functions from the code context.
methodology.baseline_results: Accuracy rates of various LLMs evaluated range from below 1% to over 90%, depending on the model and language.
